member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(hvec2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given hvec2 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Produces a zero vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector by copying a given source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(float,float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using given float values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given scalar value: x=v, y=v.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given three-component vec3 source vector: x=v.x, y=v.y.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(Unigine.vec4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given four-component vec4 source vector: x=v.x, y=v.y.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(Unigine.dvec2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given dvec2 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(Unigine.ivec2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given ivec2 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given pointer to the array of float elements: x=v[0], y=v[1].
member.param: Pointer to the array of float elements.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(float,float,ConstexprTag)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using given constant float values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.#ctor(float,ConstexprTag)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a given constant scalar value: x=v, y=v.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.abs
member.summary: Returns the absolute values of the vector components.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.set(float,float)
member.summary: Sets the vector by components.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.set(float)
member.summary: Sets the vector using the array of float elements: x=val[0], y=val[1].
member.param: Pointer to the array of float elements.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.set(Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Sets the vector equal to the specified source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.set(float)
member.summary: Sets the vector components equal to specified scalar value: x=val, y=val.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.get(float) const
member.summary: Gets the vector: val[0]=x, val[1]=y.
member.param: Pointer to the array of float elements.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.get
member.summary: Returns the pointer to the vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.get const
member.summary: Returns the constant pointer to the vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.length const
member.summary: Returns the length of the vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.length2 const
member.summary: Returns the squared length of the vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.max const
member.summary: Compares the vector components and returns the greater one.
member.returns: The greater out of the two vector components.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.normalize
member.summary: Returns normalized vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.normalizeValid
member.summary: Normalizes a vector, makes its magnitude equal to 1. When normalized, a vector keeps the same direction but its length is equal to 1. Check for the zero vector is performed: if the argument is a zero vector, then a zero vector is returned.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.normalizeFast
member.summary: Returns normalized vector, calculated using the fast inverse square root algorithm.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.normalizeValidFast
member.summary: Returns normalized vector, calculated using the fast inverse square root algorithm. Check for the zero vector is performed: if the argument is a zero vector, then a zero vector is returned.

member.summary: Performs type conversion to const float *.

member.summary: Performs type conversion to const void *.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator float *
member.summary: Performs type conversion to float *.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator void *
member.summary: Performs type conversion to void *.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator*=(float)
member.summary: Performs scalar multiplication.

member.summary: Performs vector multiplication.

member.summary: Performs vector addition.

member.summary: Performs vector negation.

member.summary: Performs vector subtraction.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator/=(Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Performs componentwise division of vectors.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator/=(float)
member.summary: Performs componentwise division of the vector by the scalar. Implemented using the calculation of inverse scalar value with subsequent by-component multiplication.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator=(Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Performs vector assignment. Destination vector = Source vector.

member.summary: Performs array access to the vector item reference by using given item index.

member.summary: Performs array access to the vector item by using given item index.

member.summary: Multiplies the vector by the value of the specified argument.

member.summary: Multiplies the vector by the value of the specified argument.

member.summary: Returns the result of division of the vector by the value of the specified arguments.

member.summary: Returns the result of division of the vector by the value of the specified arguments.

member.summary: Returns the result of division of the vector by the value of the specified arguments.

member.summary: Returns the result of division of the vector by the value of the specified arguments.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.sub(float)
member.summary: Subtracts the argument from all elements of the vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.sub(Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Subtracts each element of the specified argument from ther corresponding element.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator-=(float)
member.summary: Subtracts the argument from all elements of the vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.sum const
member.summary: Returns the sum of vector components.

member.summary: Performs addition of the specified argument.

member.summary: Performs addition of the specified argument.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.operator+=(float)
member.summary: Performs addition of the specified value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.iLength const
member.summary: Returns the inverted length of the vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.iLengthFast const
member.summary: Returns the inverted length of the vector (fast version).

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.frac const
member.summary: Returns a vector containing fractional parts of the corresponding vector components.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.min const
member.summary: Returns the minimum value among all components.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.floor const
member.summary: Returns a vector containing the largest integral values each being less than or equal to the corresponding vector component.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.vec2.ceil const
member.summary: Returns a vector containing the smallest integral values each being greater than or equal to the corresponding vector component.

member.name: F:Unigine.Math.vec2.vec2_eps
member.summary: Vector filled with epsilon constant (1e-6f).

member.name: F:Unigine.Math.vec2.vec2_inf
member.summary: Vector filled with infinity constant (1e+9f).
